comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Far From the Maddening Crowd It was so cool driving right past Copper Mountain Friday, with its traffic cones and smog and silver Audis stacked like Pez candies in the turn lanes on our way to Mayflower Gulch... which Zack and I had _entirely_ to ourselves. I'm glad Zack appreciates this stuff. For most tweakers, cross-country skiing is a lot like doing push-ups in the snow - all work, no play. But somehow he's gotten the drift of this appreciation-of-nature thing. What a goof. DU

comments.author: Rob
comments.body: Wow, I love that ski trip. Glad you had a good time :)
